channel.title: Android Studio3.0 on Androg
channel.description: Recent content in Android Studio3.0 on Androg

item.title: Android Studio 2.3.3 から3.0にしたときのメモ
item.description: はじめに dependencies { - classpath 'com.android.tools.build:gradle:2.3.3' + classpath 'com.android.tools.build:gradle:3.0.0' classpath "org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-gradle-plugin:$kotlin_version" と3.0.0にverupしたさいにエラーが出たのでその原因と対策をメモ All flavors must now belong to a named flavor dimension. エラー内容 app/build.gradle Error:All flavors must now belong to a named flavor dimension. Learn more at https://d.android.com/r/tools/flavorDimensions-missing-error-message.html 原因 The plugin now requires that all flavors belong to a named flavor dimension—even if you intend to use only a single dimension. すべてのフレーバーに 対策 To resolve this error, you need to first declare one or more dimensions using the flavorDimensions property.
